quoteText:
Remember that shared or publicly available information may be used and re-shared by other users on Spotify or across the web, so please use Spotify carefully and be mindful of your account settings.
Spotify has no responsibility for your choices to post material on the Service.
title: Spotify states risks of public information

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
tosdr.tldr: Spotify expressly states the implications of keeping information public, and also that certain specific information (e.g., username, profile picture) may not be able to be made private.
